reviewText: My 2 year old son wasn't really into it. He loves the movie cars so I thought he would like this to but he didn't. It was a cute movie though. My 4 year old nephew watched it at my house and loved it so I let him take it home with him.

This movie has it all.....These movies help kids understand Bible verses.  We were looking for movies with good messages so I didn't feel so guilty about them watching them.  I even let them watch it on the way to church.  They are much better than the Veggietale movies.  I highly recommend these movies.  They have a story, a Bible verse, and a recap of how the verse fits in the story.  I love them, even more important so does my son!!

My son loved this show before they added the Christian lessons to it, we love it even more now! I got this to add to his Easter basket and he will be thrilled. Monster trucks AND a Christian lesson, can't get any better!

was concerned they would get all "religious" throughout the cartoon, but it wasn't like that at all.  a cute bunch of shorts with nice characters that drive and zip around, followed by a religious message afterwards, which can easily be skipped.  good for kids in the 3 to 5 range (mine are 2 and 4).
This wasbought thinking it was a completely different movie. This is an animated version and for small kids. If kids were smaller would have been great
